name: Space Junk (itch) (drkephrim)
description:
A solo project I worked on during game jam this year. It's like asteroids if it were about shooting garbage.

All the assets were downloaded from opengameart.org

I got those great garbage items from Clint Bellanger, the lasers, fonts and sound effects were created by the always wonderful Kenney, and the planet and ship were created by Priest865. You guys are gods amongst men.
